    • Constructor Detail

      • Minigun

        public Minigun(int towerType,
               boolean canDrag,
               boolean valid,
               int num,
               int xp)
        Constructs the minigun tower with 3 upgrades, a set cost, damage and shot speed. Upgrades the tower if it is loaded in with a different upgrade level.
        Parameters:
        towerType - The type of the tower
        canDrag - Whether or not the tower can be dragged
        valid - Whether or not the tower location is valid.
        num - The number of upgrades that the tower has
        xp - The number of xp
